title: The Quarterback Episode With Mike Sando | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The Ringer’s Kevin Clark is joined by The Athletic’s Mike Sando to discuss the different tiers of quarterbacks (7:31), who could make the leap (23:49), and whether Deshaun Watson and the Houston Texans are underrated (43:25). 

Host: Kevin Clark 

Guest: Mike Sando
